DOC.brief_summary: In patients under general anesthesia the investigators wish to investigate association and covariance between a peripheral perfusion index as obtained by Radical 7 monitor (Masimo, Irvine, CA, USA) and more traditional hemodynamic parameters, ie. invasive blood pressure and SV as obtained by LiDCO rapid monitor (LiDCO Ldt., London, UK)
DOC.criteria: Patients for elective and subacute surgical repair of paraoesophagal hernia. Willingness to participate Patient refusal
